      @ScheduledForRemoval(inVersion="5.0.0") @Deprecated @NotNull @NotNull PlainComponentSerializer.Builder flattener(@NotNull @NotNull ComponentFlattener flattener)
      Deprecated.
      for removal since 4.8.0, use PlainTextComponentSerializer.Builder.flattener(ComponentFlattener) instead
      Set the component flattener to use.

      The default flattener is ComponentFlattener.basic() modified to throw exceptions on unknown component types.
